scripts.build: concurrently "cd play/client && npm run build" "cd editor/client && npm run build"
scripts.init: concurrently "npm install"  "cd mqtt && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install" "cd play_server && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install" "cd play && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install" "cd fetch && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install"  "cd editor && npm cache clean --force && npm rebuild && npm install"
scripts.start: concurrently " cd monitor/solid && set PORT=3003 && npm run start" "cd card_editor && cd solid && set PORT=3002 && npm run start" "cd mqtt && npm run start" "cd play && set PORT=3001 && npm run start_old" "cd fetch && npm run start"  "cd editor && set PORT=3000 && npm run start_solid"
scripts.start_old: concurrently "cd monitor/legacy && npm run start" "cd card_editor && cd solid && npm run start" "cd mqtt && npm run start" "cd play && npm run start" "cd fetch && npm run start"  "cd editor && npm run start"
